5#ifndef V8_COMPILER_TURBOSHAFT_SNAPSHOT_TABLE_OPINDEX_H_
6#define V8_COMPILER_TURBOSHAFT_SNAPSHOT_TABLE_OPINDEX_H_
7
8#include "src/compiler/turboshaft/index.h"
9#include "src/compiler/turboshaft/snapshot-table.h"
10
11namespace v8::internal::compiler::turboshaft {
12// A Wrapper around a SnapshotTable, which takes care of mapping OpIndex to Key.
13// It uses a ZoneAbslFlatHashMap to store this mapping, and is thus more
14// appropriate for cases where not many OpIndex have a corresponding key.
15template <class Value, class KeyData = NoKeyData>
16class SparseOpIndexSnapshotTable : public SnapshotTable<Value, KeyData> {
17 public:
18 using Base = SnapshotTable<Value, KeyData>;
19 using Key = typename SnapshotTable<Value, KeyData>::Key;
20
21 explicit SparseOpIndexSnapshotTable(Zone* zone)
22 : Base(zone), indices_to_keys_(zone) {}
23
24 using Base::Get;
25 Value Get(OpIndex idx) const {
26 auto it = indices_to_keys_.find(idx);
27 if (it == indices_to_keys_.end()) return Value{};
28 return Base::Get(it->second);
29 }
30
31 Value GetPredecessorValue(OpIndex idx, int predecessor_index) {
32 auto it = indices_to_keys_.find(idx);
33 if (it == indices_to_keys_.end()) return Value{};
34 return Base::GetPredecessorValue(it->second, predecessor_index);
35 }
36
37 using Base::Set;
38 bool Set(OpIndex idx, Value new_value) {
39 Key key = GetOrCreateKey(idx);
40 return Base::Set(key, new_value);
41 }
42
43 void NewKey(OpIndex idx, KeyData data, Value initial_value = Value{}) {
44 DCHECK(!indices_to_keys_[idx].has_value());
45 indices_to_keys_[idx] = Base::NewKey(data, initial_value);
46 }
47 void NewKey(OpIndex idx, Value initial_value = Value{}) {
48 NewKey(idx, KeyData{}, initial_value);
49 }
50
51 bool HasKeyFor(OpIndex idx) const {
52 return indices_to_keys_.find(idx) != indices_to_keys_.end();
53 }
54
55 base::Optional<Key> TryGetKeyFor(OpIndex idx) const {
56 auto it = indices_to_keys_.find(idx);
57 if (it != indices_to_keys_.end()) return it->second;
58 return base::nullopt;
59 }
60
61 private:
62 Key GetOrCreateKey(OpIndex idx) {
63 auto it = indices_to_keys_.find(idx);
64 if (it != indices_to_keys_.end()) return it->second;
65 Key key = Base::NewKey();
66 indices_to_keys_.insert({idx, key});
67 return key;
68 }
69 ZoneAbslFlatHashMap<OpIndex, Key> indices_to_keys_;
70};
71
72} // namespace v8::internal::compiler::turboshaft
73
74#endif // V8_COMPILER_TURBOSHAFT_SNAPSHOT_TABLE_OPINDEX_H_
